ing: 1/2 large chilled seedless watermelon, cut into 1-inch cubes
1 cup thinly sliced fresh basil leaves
2 tablespoons balsamic vinegar, or more to taste
salt and ground black pepper to taste
des: "This is a delicious summer salad. The ingredients really go well together."
ins: Gently toss watermelon, onion, basil, cilantro, mint, lime juice, feta cheese, olive oil, balsamic vinegar, salt, and black pepper together in a large bowl.
